bug.author: chandramoulirajagopalan
bug.summary: Error building adanet using bazel from source with protobuf version 3.6.0
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/6984#issuecomment-449315610>bazelbuild/bazel#6984 (comment)</denchmark-link>
The link says the version is not compatible with bazel 0.21.0 . So the workspace version must be updated to 3.6.1.3

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chandramoulirajagopalan>@chandramoulirajagopalan</denchmark-link> : Do you mind sending a PR to do so? I'll be happy to review it. We are looking to drop our requirements for protobuf and Bazel in the future to simplify installation.
Yes I will submit a PR as quick as possible.
